name: Personal Website Template
description: A modern personal website template with portfolio and blog features, built using SEVDO frontend compiler
author: SEVDO Team

backend.description: FastAPI backend with PostgreSQL database and authentication

pages.Home.s: Homepage with hero section, featured projects, and call-to-action
pages.About.s: About page with personal story, journey, and skills
pages.Projects.s: Portfolio showcase with project descriptions and demos
pages.Contact.s: Contact information, form, and social media links

customization.tagline: Full-stack developer passionate about creating amazing web applications

installation.backend: Copy auth.py and configure database credentials in environment variables
installation.frontend: Compile .s files using SEVDO frontend compiler with required prefabs
installation.customization: Edit template.json customization values and recompile frontend
